turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you put in an online order for pizza from Joe's Pizzeria for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely! How many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want 2 pizzas. One is going to be a barbeque chicken pizza and the other one should be a supreme.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK and what sizes do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think we are going to need extra larges to feed everyone in the office.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you sure two extra large pizzas are going to be enough for all of us?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You're right, maybe I should add a third pizza as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That is what I was thinking.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, lets have a ham and pineapple for the third one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should that be an extra large as well?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, all three extra large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Is that going to be all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, lets order two 2 liters of Pepsi as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, three pizzas and soda, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, actually let's order two medium cheesy breads as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, online they only have the small and large sizes of the cheesy bread.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets make it two large cheesy breads then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so we have an extra large barbeque chicken pizza, an extra large supreme pizza, an extra large ham and pineapple pizza, two large cheesy breads and two 2 liters of Pepsi, is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I think that is everything.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, do you want me to charge it to the company card then too?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. I will send that receipt right to your email.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. The pizzas will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.
